translation.en: [Tom Hardy] Predators across the planet.
Unmatched in strength.
Speed.
Strategy.
-Stealth. -[squeaking]
And teamwork.
-But staying on top is never easy. -[growl]
As the world around them changes,
they must adapt faster than ever before to maintain their rule.
translation.ko: 그들의 지배를 유지하려면 어느 때보다 빨리 적응해야 합니다

translation.en: In Tanzania's Serengeti,
a notorious brotherhood of cheetahs.
They command this vast hunting territory.
But their status is under attack.
Rivals are closing in.
The battle is no longer just to stay on top…
…but to stay alive,
as they try to cling on to their mighty alliance.
For the past six years,
male cheetahs Luka and Kovu have held their territory
translation.ko: 수컷 치타 '루카'와 '코부'는 자신들의 영역을 지켜 왔습니다

translation.en: here in the southern plains of Africa's Serengeti.
Kovu, with his scarred nose,
is a cunning and meticulous hunter,
the brains of the operation.
While Luka, with his muscular frame,
is a creature of brute strength.
They're always at each other's side.
But they're not brothers.
They were born 50 miles apart.
As young males, their paths crossed,
translation.ko: 두 수컷은 어린 시절에 우연히 만나

translation.en: and through many years learning the rules of the savanna together,
translation.ko: 오랜 세월 함께하며 사바나의 법칙을 배웠습니다

translation.en: their unbreakable bond was forged.
While females are solitary,
male cheetahs band together.
But Luka's raw power,
combined with Kovu's sharp mind,
has made them a double act like no other,
seeing off all rivals
and dominating the largest prey.
Now eight years old,
the pair are fiercely territorial.
The hunting grounds they hold are 20 square miles of rolling savanna.
There are rocky outcrops for cover.
Pools to drink from.
And every year,
it floods with herds of zebra, wildebeest, and gazelle.
translation.ko: 얼룩말, 누, 가젤로 이뤄진 초식 동물 떼가 몰려옵니다

translation.en: They fiercely defend this territory from neighboring males.
translation.ko: 콤비는 주변 수컷들이 침범하지 못하게 차단합니다

translation.en: So any females that come here
are theirs alone to mate with.
They are the epitome of an apex predator.
And the success of the entire population relies on strong males like them
translation.ko: 이들처럼 강력한 수컷이 얼마나 자손을 생산하느냐에 따라

translation.en: mating and passing on their genes.
Luka and Kovu have become masters of this game.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부는 이제 이 경쟁에 통달했습니다

translation.en: But the rules of their world are changing.
It's August,
and the Serengeti's dry season is kicking into gear.
The sun scorches the grass.
Herds are heading north to find water.
translation.ko: 초식 동물 떼는 물을 찾아 북쪽으로 가죠

translation.en: And the predators that remain are fighting over a shrinking supply of food.
translation.ko: 남은 포식 동물들은 줄어든 먹이를 두고 싸웁니다

translation.en: But the twist of the knife is that for three years,
translation.ko: 그런데 엎친 데 덮친 격으로 이 지역은 3년째 가뭄에 시달리고 있습니다

translation.en: the region has been plagued by drought.
The dry season months of June to October have been getting hotter and hotter.
As Luka and Kovu's world becomes a hostile tinderbox,
translation.ko: 루카와 코부의 세계가 일촉즉발의 위기에 놓인 이상

translation.en: guarding their patch is more crucial than ever.
translation.ko: 영역을 지키는 일은 어느 때보다 중요합니다

translation.en: So their rules are clear.
Intruders keep out or be killed.
translation.ko: 침입자는 막아 내거나 죽여 없애야 하죠

translation.en: But five miles away…
at their territory's western boundary…
there's been a breach.
A gang of four powerful sons,
led by their imposing mum, known as the Solaro family.
translation.ko: 당당한 어미가 이끄는 이 무리는 솔라로 가족으로 불리죠

translation.en: They have swagger and strength in numbers.
Even the hyenas seem to sense their power.
Watching Mum stalk gazelle,
the sons are fast learning the ways of the hunter.
For now, the four sons remain at Mum's side.
But any day now, this band of brothers will leave as a coalition
translation.ko: 머지않아 4형제는 따로 무리를 이뤄 떠나갈 겁니다

translation.en: to stake their own territory.
There's no way Luka and Kovu can allow the Solaro sons to share their patch.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부가 솔라로 4형제와 땅을 공유할 리는 없습니다

translation.en: In this drought, there won't be enough food to feed them all.
translation.ko: 이런 가뭄에서는 모두 먹이가 부족할 겁니다

translation.en: But against four males,
they'll be dangerously outnumbered.
The one thing that could help them
is far from here.
A hundred miles to the north, over rivers and valleys…
translation.ko: 강을 건너고 계곡을 넘어서 북쪽으로 150km쯤 올라가면…

translation.en: a mega-herd of one and a half million wildebeest and zebra are on the move.
translation.ko: 분주하게 움직이는 150만 마리의 누와 얼룩말 떼가 있습니다

translation.en: The pregnant females need to graze constantly to make milk.
translation.ko: 임신한 암컷이 젖을 만들려면 끊임없이 풀을 뜯어야 하죠

translation.en: When the rains return, the plains in Luka and Kovu's territory
translation.ko: 비가 다시 내리면 루카와 코부의 평원에

translation.en: are where the sweetest grasses will grow.
So the herd must travel there.
When the herds arrive, there'll be enough zebra and wildebeest
translation.ko: 초식 동물 떼가 오면 얼룩말과 누가 많아져서

translation.en: to feed all the cheetahs across this region…
translation.ko: 이곳의 모든 치타가 배를 채울 수 있으니

translation.en: and no need for the Solaro sons to encroach.
But it's not that easy.
Blocking the herd's path like a slick, black serpent,
translation.ko: 미끈하게 뻗은 검은 뱀처럼 초식 동물 떼의 길을 가로막는

translation.en: the Mara River.
Steep banks,
deep water,
no way round.
As the bankside swells with bodies,
their migration may have reached its limit.
If the herd can't reach the southern plains,
translation.ko: 초식 동물 떼가 남부 평원에 오지 못하면

translation.en: Luka and Kovu won't just go hungry.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부는 굶주리게 될 뿐만 아니라

translation.en: They may face a turf war with the Solaro brothers.
translation.ko: 솔라로 형제들과 영역 다툼을 하게 될지도 모릅니다

translation.en: But right now, the boys have a bigger problem.
translation.ko: 하지만 지금 더 심각한 문제가 있죠

translation.en: Smoke.
The drought has left the grass bone-dry.
It ignites with terrifying ease.
Luka and Kovu have seen wildfires before.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부는 들불을 본 적이 있어서

translation.en: They know they can spread with devastating speed.
translation.ko: 불이 순식간에 번질 수 있다는 걸 압니다

translation.en: As the heat rises, they can only watch the inferno in disbelief.
translation.ko: 열기가 치솟으니 이 불지옥을 멍하니 지켜볼 수밖에 없죠

translation.en: There's nothing they can do.
They need to retreat to a safe haven.
As the fire blazes unchecked,
those who can't run, hide.
While white storks descend,
to make a quick meal of the insects escaping the blaze.
The flames tear through the heart of Luka and Kovu's hard-won territory.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부가 힘겹게 차지한 땅 한가운데로 불길이 번집니다

translation.en: Everything they have worked for may be about to slip away.
translation.ko: 그들이 애써 일군 모든 게 곧 사라질지도 모르죠

translation.en: By morning, the fire's burnt itself out,
translation.ko: 아침이 되자 불은 다 타서 꺼져버렸고

translation.en: and their entire territory is transformed.
Just scorched earth remains.
A hyena, singed and blistered by the fire,
translation.ko: 화상을 입어 물집이 생긴 하이에나 한 마리가

translation.en: slurps at a nest of baked ostrich eggs.
The mongoose emerge to an empty landscape.
translation.ko: 텅 빈 풍경에 몽구스가 모습을 드러냅니다

translation.en: The last of the gazelles have left.
Until the rains return,
this once rich territory will remain barren.
translation.ko: 풍요로웠던 이 땅은 황량하게 남아 있겠죠

translation.en: The boys have no choice but to abandon it.
With no territory, finding food will be a huge challenge,
translation.ko: 자기 영역이 없으면 먹이를 찾기가 무척 힘들 겁니다

translation.en: and their ability to attract females is now near to none.
translation.ko: 암컷을 끌어들일 능력도 이제 거의 바닥났죠

translation.en: They must try to find a new ground.
But it's a crowded landscape.
If they head east, they'll go beyond the boundary of the grasslands
translation.ko: 동쪽으로 가면 초원의 경계선을 넘어가게 됩니다

translation.en: to where farmers kill cheetahs to protect their livestock.
translation.ko: 거기선 농부가 가축을 지키려고 치타를 죽이죠

translation.en: So their only option is to head west,
deep into the Serengeti's heart,
a place ruled by hyenas, lions, and rival cheetahs,
translation.ko: 그곳을 다스리는 하이에나와 사자, 라이벌 치타는

translation.en: all vying for the same food.
The duo's fate now rests more than ever
with the arrival of the wildebeest and zebra.
Ninety miles to the north,
the herd calculates its next move.
translation.ko: 초식 동물 떼가 다음 수를 따져봅니다

translation.en: For their survival, they need to cross.
But a flotilla of crocodiles is lying in wait.
translation.ko: 하지만 악어 떼가 숨어서 기다리고 있습니다

translation.en: They are the apex predator of this water world.
They've not eaten for months.
Elders who have run this gauntlet before, know timing is everything.
translation.ko: 강을 건너본 연장자들은 타이밍이 중요하다는 걸 압니다

translation.en: There are no second chances.
The wet rocks become a perilous slick that can snap legs and crack bones.
translation.ko: 축축한 바위에서 미끄러지면 다리가 부러지고 뼈에 금이 가죠

translation.en: The walking wounded limp to safety.
Those too badly injured are defenseless against the advancing crocodiles.
translation.ko: 상처가 심한 동물들은 악어의 공격을 막아 낼 수가 없죠

translation.en: But while the crocodiles have their mouths full,
translation.ko: 그래도 악어의 입이 가득 찬 사이에

translation.en: hundreds of thousands more make it through.
With their noses to the wind, they push on south.
For Luka and Kovu, these herds can't arrive soon enough.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부는 초식 동물 떼를 목이 빠지게 기다리죠

translation.en: It's now September,
and the drought is tightening its grip.
Lions shelter from the midday sun.
Marauding hyenas patrol the plains.
And the Solaro family are closing in,
now skirting past the scorched territory once held by Luka and Kovu.
translation.ko: 한때 루카와 코부의 영역이었던 그을린 땅을 둘러 갑니다

translation.en: Oblivious to the threat trailing them,
the pair are now trying to adapt to life on the move,
translation.ko: 콤비는 유랑 생활에 적응하려 노력 중이죠

translation.en: as they continue searching for a new home.
Ordinarily, they'd get the water they need from the prey they eat.
translation.ko: 보통 때는 먹이를 섭취하면서 필요한 물을 얻습니다

translation.en: But with hunting opportunities so scarce,
the boys are desperately thirsty.
The problem is, the few watering holes that haven't dried
translation.ko: 문제는 아직 마르지 않은 물웅덩이 몇 곳에

translation.en: are now crawling with lions.
There's no way the pride will share this precious resource with cheetahs.
translation.ko: 사자 무리가 이 귀중한 자원을 치타와 나눌 리 없죠

translation.en: Eventually, they reach an unoccupied pool.
But the drought has impacted everything.
translation.ko: 하지만 가뭄의 영향을 피한 곳은 없죠

translation.en: A single drop is enough to tell Luka that the water is putrid
translation.ko: 루카는 한 방울만 마시고도 썩은 물이라는 걸 압니다

translation.en: and not safe to drink.
There's nothing for the boys here.
Dust chokes the air…
and giraffes scour the trees for the remaining green leaves.
translation.ko: 기린은 푸른 잎이 있는지 나무를 꼼꼼히 살펴보죠

translation.en: The duo's search for a new territory brings them to a barren plateau.
translation.ko: 수컷 콤비가 새 영역을 찾다가 황량한 고원에 다다릅니다

translation.en: There's no sign of the large gazelles they would ideally hunt.
translation.ko: 완벽한 사냥감인 큰 가젤은 그림자도 안 보이지만

translation.en: But it's no time to be picky.
These hungry boys would eat whatever they can catch.
translation.ko: 굶주린 수컷 콤비는 잡히는 대로 배를 채울 겁니다

translation.en: Kovu senses there's food hiding here.
translation.ko: 코부가 사냥감이 숨어 있는 걸 알아차리죠

translation.en: They both scan the scrub, searching for clues.
translation.ko: 둘 다 덤불 속에서 단서를 찾아 헤맵니다

translation.en: The black stripes beneath their eyes absorb the sun's glare,
translation.ko: 눈 밑의 검은 줄무늬가 햇빛을 흡수하는 덕분에

translation.en: enhancing their vision.
Their hunting instinct is triggered by the slightest movement.
translation.ko: 아주 작은 움직임에도 사냥 본능이 발동합니다

translation.en: So if the hare keeps still…
it could go unnoticed.
Close call.
But Kovu clocks it.
Even a lightning-fast hare can't escape the fastest animal on land.
translation.ko: 번개처럼 빠른 산토끼도 달아날 수 없습니다 가장 빠른 육지 동물에게서는요

translation.en: It's not much,
but the hare is a lifeline to keep Luka and Kovu going.
And they'll need all the energy they can get.
Their journey has now led them to within a mile of the Solaro family.
translation.ko: 이제 반경 1.6km 안에 솔라로 가족이 있으니까요

translation.en: If their paths cross, it's bad news.
translation.ko: 솔라로 가족과 마주치면 좋을 게 없습니다

translation.en: Only if the migrating herds arrive soon
will there be enough food to avert a bloody turf war.
translation.ko: 먹이가 충분해져서 끔찍한 영역 다툼을 피할 수 있죠

translation.en: The herds are now only 70 miles to the north.
translation.ko: 초식 동물 떼는 북쪽으로 불과 110km 거리에 있죠

translation.en: But there's a snag.
The fresh grass they're after in the southern plains
translation.ko: 이들이 찾는 남부 평원의 싱싱한 풀은

translation.en: is triggered by the first rains.
But the rains are late. So the herds have stopped in their tracks.
translation.ko: 그런데 비 소식이 늦어지자 초식 동물 떼가 걸음을 멈췄죠

translation.en: In previous decades, the wet seasons here arrived like clockwork.
translation.ko: 이곳의 우기는 수십 년 동안 늘 규칙적으로 시작됐습니다

translation.en: But those days are a distant memory.
For Luka and Kovu,
it's a disaster.
Walking north to intercept the herds is not an option.
translation.ko: 북쪽으로 가서 먹이를 낚아챌 순 없죠

translation.en: They'd have to trespass dangerously through many rival cheetah territories.
translation.ko: 라이벌 치타 무리의 영역을 위험스레 뚫고 가야 하니까요

translation.en: They're running low on food,
and their competition
is closing in.
Right now, the four Solaro sons remain at Mum's side…
translation.ko: 현재 솔라로 수컷 4형제는 어미 곁에 남아 있습니다

translation.en: absorbing her skills as a hunter.
She, too, is resigned to taking hares.
But a single hare can't feed five large cheetahs.
Snatching it for herself is a signal to her sons.
translation.ko: 혼자 먹이를 낚아채는 건 하나의 신호입니다

translation.en: It's time for them to leave and find a territory of their own.
translation.ko: 이제 4형제는 어미를 떠나 자기만의 영역을 찾아야 하죠

translation.en: They're now old enough to hunt for themselves.
But in these extreme dry conditions,
they won't last long without Mum's expertise.
translation.ko: 어미의 전문 기술이 없으면 오래 버티지 못하죠

translation.en: The hungry sons protest.
Mum gives in.
Their bony bodies reveal
that even this powerful family hasn't escaped the grip of the dry season.
translation.ko: 이 강인한 가족도 건기의 영향을 피하지 못했음을 보여주죠

translation.en: Their cracked fur is a sign of sickness.
Until the sons regain their strength,
Mum must continue to fend for them.
But she won't be able to keep them all fed for much longer.
translation.ko: 4형제 모두를 오래 먹여 살릴 순 없을 겁니다

translation.en: The blistering October days tick by, squeezing the life from the land.
translation.ko: 10월의 무더운 날이 계속되자 육지의 삶이 괴로워집니다

translation.en: Thirsty elephants trudge through on their long march to find water.
translation.ko: 목마른 코끼리들은 물을 찾아 기나긴 행진을 느릿느릿 이어 가죠

translation.en: Luka and Kovu are surviving almost entirely on hares now.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부는 이제 거의 산토끼로 연명합니다

translation.en: They end each sitting by cleaning each other's faces.
translation.ko: 매번 서로의 얼굴을 핥으며 식사를 마칩니다

translation.en: Not a drop of food can be wasted.
It is a tender ritual they share
to show their utter devotion to each other.
But for the Solaro family,
things have gone from bad to worse.
translation.ko: 전보다 더 끔찍한 상황에 놓이고 말았습니다

translation.en: Their sickness has intensified,
and the skinniest son is now a wasted figure of mere skin and bone.
translation.ko: 제일 여윈 아들은 뼈와 가죽만 남을 만큼 쇠약해졌죠

translation.en: Cheetah brothers share an unbreakable bond.
The thought of deserting him is inconceivable.
translation.ko: 아픈 형제를 버리는 건 상상할 수 없는 일이죠

translation.en: They must keep moving.
But with every step, he's getting weaker.
The family wait patiently for the sick brother to catch up,
translation.ko: 아픈 형제가 따라올 때까지 가족은 참고 기다립니다

translation.en: willing him on with their cries.
Mum's tried to find food,
but their slow progress in these drought conditions has made hunting impossible.
translation.ko: 가뭄철에 움직임까지 더디니 사냥 자체가 불가능합니다

translation.en: The whole family are slowly starving.
translation.ko: 온 가족이 서서히 굶어 죽어 갑니다

translation.en: There's nothing his mum and brothers can do.
translation.ko: 어미와 형제들은 할 수 있는 게 없습니다

translation.en: For their own survival, they must hunt.
They've now no choice but to do the unthinkable and leave him.
translation.ko: 상상도 할 수 없는 일이지만 이제 형제를 두고 갈 수밖에 없죠

translation.en: Abandoned, the sick cheetah's fate
now rests in nature's hands.
A mile away in the neighboring valley,
fortune may have once again swung in Luka and Kovu's favor.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부의 운명이 또다시 바뀐 것 같습니다

translation.en: With the Solaros weakened by sickness, their threat to the boys is fading.
translation.ko: 솔라로 가족이 병들어 약해지면서 위협받을 가능성이 줄고 있죠

translation.en: If they are going to take a new territory, now is the time.
translation.ko: 새로운 영역을 차지할 계획이라면 지금이 적기입니다

translation.en: The tides have turned.
Luka and Kovu have defied the drought.
And as December looms…
…salvation is on its way.
Four weeks later than usual,
fat raindrops bathe the land.
It's a welcome opportunity for Luka and Kovu to clean their dusty bodies.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부는 반색하며 이참에 몸에서 먼지를 씻어 내죠

translation.en: The smell of the rain drifts on the wind.
Thirty miles to the north, the herds get the signal they've been waiting for.
translation.ko: 북쪽으로 약 50km 거리에서 초식 동물 떼가 기다리던 신호를 받았습니다

translation.en: Time to move south.
Weeks pass…
and the storms become more frequent.
Streams flow.
Flowers bloom.
And pools fill with water,
attracting a dazzle of bird life.
The yellowed grass gives way to a sea of green…
and swarming across it from every direction…
translation.ko: 사방에서 동물이 떼 지어 몰려들 때

translation.en: the mega-herd has arrived.
Over a million wildebeest,
together with hundreds of thousands of zebra, hartebeest, and gazelle
translation.ko: 얼룩말, 사슴영양, 가젤 수십만 마리와 함께

translation.en: that have joined them to feed.
By February, the cheetahs' world is transformed.
After months of hard struggle,
Luka and Kovu's quest for a new territory is almost complete.
translation.ko: 새 영역을 찾는 루카와 코부의 여정이 끝나 갑니다

translation.en: They've secured an area on the edge of the short-grass plains
translation.ko: 새로 차지한 짧은 풀밭 가장자리 땅은

translation.en: that has everything they need.
And it's within sight of the advancing mega-herd.
translation.ko: 초대형 초식 동물 떼가 이동하는 것도 보이죠

translation.en: But there's a catch.
Nomadic lions and hyena
are also flooding into the area
and patrolling the herds.
The boys' new patch has an abundance of food.
translation.ko: 치타 콤비의 새 땅에는 먹이가 풍부합니다

translation.en: But it also now has more competition than ever.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 어느 때보다도 경쟁이 치열하죠

translation.en: Luka and Kovu must be smart.
If the lions spot them moving in on the herds,
translation.ko: 초식 동물 떼에게 다가가다 사자에게 들키면

translation.en: they'll be chased from the area.
So they select their spot
and let the herds come to them.
These boys are far more than fast sprinters.
translation.ko: 이 콤비는 단거리 경주만 잘하는 게 아니죠

translation.en: They are patient and calculating hunters.
Gradually,
the herds edge closer.
The duo needs to select their target wisely.
Wildebeest come armed with sharp horns,
and zebras pack a lethal kick.
Only the most fearless cheetahs will risk hunting something so big.
translation.ko: 가장 용감한 치타만이 과감하게 덩치 큰 동물을 사냥할 겁니다

translation.en: Perfectly in sync,
they move in.
They goad the herd,
hoping a young or injured animal reveals itself.
translation.ko: 새끼나 다친 동물이 모습을 드러내길 바라면서요

translation.en: A baby hartebeest that arrived with the mega-herd.
translation.ko: 초대형 초식 동물 떼와 함께 온 새끼 사슴영양입니다

translation.en: A worthwhile meal in Kovu's eyes.
But it's not alone.
Its mum wheels round to fend off the attack.
Then, through the dust,
Luka spies a young zebra.
A sizable meal,
and much less risky than an adult.
The hunt is on.
The herd splinters.
Luka just dodges the zebra's hooves.
But the zebra is too strong.
Luka is losing the battle.
Then, right when he's needed…
his wingman arrives.
It's a remarkable show of teamwork.
Their risk of hunting large prey is rewarded.
translation.ko: 큰 사냥감을 과감하게 노린 보람이 있네요

translation.en: By the time they finish, their bellies bulge like basketballs.
translation.ko: 식사가 끝나 갈 무렵에는 배가 농구공처럼 불룩해졌죠

translation.en: Their strong stomachs will make fast work of this feast.
translation.ko: 배불리 먹었지만 위가 튼튼하니 금세 소화될 겁니다

translation.en: And in just 24 hours,
they'll be ready to go again.
The large area Luka and Kovu have secured has everything they need.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부가 차지한 넓은 땅에는 부족한 게 없습니다

translation.en: It's a prime territory.
So the duo will work hard to keep it.
Each morning they spray the termite mounds in their patch with their scent.
translation.ko: 콤비는 아침마다 흰개미 언덕에 오줌을 싸서 냄새를 남기죠

translation.en: It works as a signpost, telling other males to keep out.
translation.ko: 다른 수컷에게 접근하지 말라고 경고 푯말을 세우는 셈입니다

translation.en: But on one mound,
Luka is picking up on a strange odor.
It smells like an intruder has been here.
Any threat from a rival cheetah must be extinguished fast.
translation.ko: 라이벌 치타의 위협은 재빨리 제거해야 합니다

translation.en: They've proved they are powerful enough to secure a territory here.
translation.ko: 콤비는 이 땅을 차지할 만큼 강력하다는 걸 증명했습니다

translation.en: Now they need to prove they can protect it.
translation.ko: 이제 지킬 능력이 있음을 보여줘야 하죠

translation.en: And the bold trespasser isn't even hiding.
Into formation,
they advance.
But at the last minute,
the cheetah's identity becomes clear.
The rival male is in fact a female.
Despite her frosty welcome, she wants to mate.
translation.ko: 암컷은 쌀쌀맞게 굴면서도 짝짓기는 하려 합니다

translation.en: Female cheetahs are notoriously choosy.
They only pick males who are fit and strong.
translation.ko: 건강하고 강한 수컷만 짝짓기 상대로 삼습니다

translation.en: Staking this new territory confirms the boys' healthy credentials.
translation.ko: 이 새로운 땅을 차지했으니 수컷 콤비의 건강은 확인됐죠

translation.en: This female is clearly interested,
even if Luka is getting mixed signals.
If she were to pick one male over the other,
translation.ko: 이 암컷이 두 수컷 중 하나를 고르면

translation.en: it would fracture the boys' alliance.
Luckily, a twist in cheetah biology
means a single litter can have multiple fathers.
translation.ko: 다행히 치타는 생물학적으로 독특하게도 새끼 하나에 아비가 여럿일 수 있죠

translation.en: So, in the coming days, Kovu and Luka can mate with her and pass on their genes.
translation.ko: 그러니 앞으로 코부와 루카는 이 암컷과 짝짓기하여 유전자를 물려줄 수 있습니다

translation.en: Through their strength and teamwork,
Luka and Kovu's formidable double act has defied fire and drought.
translation.ko: 루카와 코부는 강력한 콤비를 이뤄 들불과 가뭄을 견뎌 냈죠

translation.en: But unknown challenges still lie ahead,
as the human population around their grassland grows
translation.ko: 치타의 초원 주변에 인구가 점차 늘어나면서

translation.en: and space for cheetahs shrinks.
The boys succeeded in their quest to mate,
and now a new generation is stepping out onto the plains.
translation.ko: 이제 새로운 세대가 평원으로 힘차게 나아갑니다

translation.en: And fresh coalitions are being formed.
There is now no question
that the cheetahs' apex status is guaranteed here for many years to come.
translation.ko: 치타는 최상위 포식자로서 이곳에 확실히 자리매김하여 오래도록 군림할 겁니다

translation.en: Next time, in Botswana,
a legendary lioness and her pride
face the fight of their lives
…as they battle to keep ten young cubs alive.
